makes user_id field nullable

If a user attempts to sign in with an account that does not exists, the exception below is thrown, because Sentry attempts to update the throttle table with a null user_id. This makes the user_id field nullable.

```
Illuminate \ Database \ QueryException
SQLSTATE[HY000]: General error: 1364 Field 'user_id' doesn't have a default value (SQL: insert into `throttle` (`type`, `updated_at`, `created_at`) values (global, 2014-03-27 08:55:12, 2014-03-27 08:55:12))
```

Fix toArray method calls in Throttle.

Fix toArray method calls in Throttle.

getBanned() and getBanned() do not exists on Throttle, so they get passed to the magic call function of model, resulting in an error: `Call to undefined method Illuminate\Database\Query\Builder::getSuspended()`
This fixes both calls.

Flush buffer for groups after add/remove operations in Eloquent\User model

We should flush cached `$this->userGroups` value after `attach()`/`detach()` group to/from user. Second solution for this is to append/delete group to/from buffer, but for appending case we don't know order into collection (it may be override in the `groups()` method).

Fix bug caused by $matched value not being reset to false
Fix bug in previous checkin (typo and logic)

Add wildcard "*" support in permission setting.

Currently wildcard "*" is only allowed in permission checks but not in the permission settings. This allows permission setting to use wildcards also. If a permission setting is defined as `admin.posts.*` then the check `hasAccess('admin.posts.edit')` will return true.

This is especially helpful in L4 where it is possible to automatically do a check on every `controller.action` using a generic filter and no explicit checking anywhere else.

Signed-off-by: drsii <dan.syme@gmail.com>

Removed unique index from username field.

A problem was created by adding a unique index on both email and
username fields. If the project is only using emails, and usernames
are left blank then the default empty string is picked up as a
duplicate key by the index.
